channel.title: Undone
channel.description: When big news happens, the world tunes in and then moves on. But often the stories we thought were over haven’t really ended; they were the beginning of something else. Undone is a new show from Gimlet Media that digs up the surprising things that happened when we weren’t looking.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show from Gimlet Media about how big stories we thought were over were actually the beginning of something else, hosted by Pat Walters.
channel.itunes:author: Gimlet
channel.itunes:summary: When big news happens, the world tunes in and then moves on. But often the stories we thought were over haven’t really ended; they were the beginning of something else. Undone is a new show from Gimlet Media that digs up the surprising things that happened when we weren’t looking.
